name: M O O N W A R D E N
name_original: M O O N W A R D E N
description:
There's a dark, brooding disturbance on Earth. The balance of life and death has been disturbed, and the evil apparitions of darkness have conquered the world, and someone has to save it!

In Moonwarden, you play as a guardian of the moonlight, where your objective is to banish all of your enemies before your light fades. Killing enemies replenishes it, however, so the quicker you clear the level, the better!

This game has been submitted to the ECGC Game Showcase.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Use the mouse and click in the direction you want to dash.

Press Escape to pause.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please leave a comment with your feedback! We'd really appreciate it.
